me.ihdeveloper.api

Class SignEditorAPI

  • java.lang.Object
    • me.ihdeveloper.api.SignEditorAPI

  • public final class SignEditorAPI
extends java.lang.Object
    An API for using custom sign editor with players.

    • Method Detail

      • initialize

        public static void initialize(java.util.logging.Logger logger,
                              org.bukkit.Server server)
        Initializes the API. Only by the API plugin
        Parameters:
        logger - Logger of the plugin
        server - The bukkit server

      • isInEditor

        public static boolean isInEditor(org.bukkit.entity.Player player)
        Checks if the player is using custom sign editor.
        Parameters:
        player - The player who might be using the sign editor
        Returns:
        True if the player is using the sign editor. False if it's not using the sign editor or using a vanilla one.

      • open

        public static void open(org.bukkit.entity.Player player,
                        SignEditorCallback callback,
                        java.lang.String... lines)
        Opens the custom sign editor for the player
        Parameters:
        player - The player to open the sign editor
        callback - A callback for firing events that happens on the sign editor
        lines - The default lines of the sign editor

      • close

        public static void close(org.bukkit.entity.Player player,
                         java.lang.String[] lines)
        Fired when the player clicks "Done" on the sign editor. Only used by the API plugin.
        Parameters:
        player - The player who clicked "Done" on the sign editor.
        lines - The submitted lines by the player
